name: Ruff, Underdog Champ

rulings.text: Once Ruff is revealed in any zone, for the rest of the match, any spell or ability that references the Hound creature type instead references the Dog creature type and all Hounds are Dogs instead. This isn’t a type-changing or text-changing effect. It’s simply time-traveling errata that has been, will have been, or may will be issued.
If a game in a match is a draw, no player lost that game, even if the game was a draw because both players lost the game at the same time.

text:
All Hounds are Dogs. (We'll errata this to be true.)
First strike, lifelink
Underdog — If you've lost a game this match, Ruff, Underdog Champ and other Dogs you control get +1/+1.
